value.query:
SELECT 
RecordType.DeveloperName,
Id,
Name,
%vlocity_namespace%__Address1__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Age__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__City__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__ConstructionType__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Description__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__DeveloperName__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Gender__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__InsuredParty__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__MaritalStatus__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__MarketValue__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__ModelYear__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Model__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Motors__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PolicyId__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__PostalCode__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__State__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Style__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Type__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__Use__c,
%vlocity_namespace%__YearBuilt__c 
FROM %vlocity_namespace%__PolicyLineItem__c WHERE %vlocity_namespace%__PolicyId__c = '{{parent.obj.PolicyId}}'
